parameters.name: context
parameters.description: An AudioContext representing the audio context you want the node to be associated with.

parameters.name: options Optional
parameters.description: An AudioNodeOptions dictionary object defining the properties you want the MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode to have.

members.name: MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode.stream
members.description: Is a MediaStream containing a single AudioMediaStreamTrack with the same number of channels as the node itself. You can use this property to get a stream out of the audio graph and feed it into another construct, such as a Media Recorder.
